divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS HOME SLEEPING ON THE COUCH AND A BRIGHT LIGHT OUT THE SECOND STORY FOYER WINDOW CAUGHT MY EYE; SAW THREE VERY BRIGHT LIGHTS HOVERING (KITE LIKE)ALWAYS SEEMED TO FACE NORTH; AN ADDITIONAL LIGHT APPEARED AND ROTATED HALF WAY AROUND OBJECT.
